kpi.name: M1006C295

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DB-HSDPA DUE TO NO REPLY
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Radio Bearer setups/reconfigurations for DB-HSDPA because of UE not responding. Also M1006C211 is updated along with this counter if the radio bearer was not using DC-HSDPA previously. UPDATED: When the UE does not respond to the RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP, RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION, RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION or RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION message sent by the RNC for DB-HSDPA establishment and a timer expires in the RNC.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DB-HSDPA DUE TO NO REPLY
